question: There are 183 fifth-graders at Maple Grove School. 23 of them are girls. On Tuesday, 6 fifth-grade girls and 7 fifth-grade boys were absent. How many fifth grade boys were at Maple Grove School on Tuesday?
answer:
Of the 183 fifth graders, 23 are girls, so 183 students - 23 girls = <<183-23=160>>160 boys.
On Tuesday there were 160 boys - 7 absent = <<160-7=153>>153 boys.
#### 153
